metadata.title: CVE-2018-8032 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Apache Axis 1.x up to and including 1.4 is vulnerable to a cross-site scripting (XSS) attack in the default servlet/services.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-8032` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libaxis-java - 1.4-28
No subscription required

criterions.comment: axis package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4-28').
